text: The 1977–78 season was Mansfield Town's 41st season in the Football League and 1st and to date only season in the Second Division, they finished in 22nd position with 31 points seven points away from safety. ==Final league table== ==Results== ===Football League Second Division=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%; text-align:center"
